data.title: SETHERIAL Signs With Debemur Morti Productions
data.meta_description: Swedish Black Metal pioneers SETHERIAL certainly need no introduction. We really have found our best settlement for the horde and we're...
data.text:
Swedish Black Metal pioneers SETHERIAL certainly need no introduction. Lurking in the underground since 1993, the horde recently decided to join forces with French label Debemur Morti Productions.

Drummer Mysteriis relates: "I think DMP is perfect for Setherial. We really have found our best settlement for the horde and we're working with great enthusiasm on the next album."

The band is currently busy writing its as-yet-untitled seventh album, which shall be released in 2012.

Setherial will be headlining Under The Black Sun Festival Part 14 in Bernau/Helenenau (near Berlin), Germany, on July 2nd.

Further updates to follow.
